subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The freshman Lazar Hayward scored a career-high 18 points last night to lead No. 12 Marquette to an 80-67 victory against Villanova.
snippet: The freshman Lazar Hayward scored a career-high 18 points last night to lead No. 12 Marquette to an 80-67 victory against Villanova.
